blog.description:
Part Supergirl/ Flash/ Gifted/ LoT/ Roswell New Mexico/ Shadowhunters fanpage, part music media (songs, lyrics, gifs), part semi inspirational/sassy textposts with the occasional rant. Yeah, that sounds about right. BTS, Monsta X, NCT, Blackpink and Day6 trash. WWE nerd. I have an overactive brain that I use to psychoanalyze fictional characters.
#IDONTMIND

summary: AU Fan Fiction - The Seoul Conflict Chapter Seventeen (NSFW)
title: AU Fan Fiction - The Seoul Conflict Chapter Seventeen (NSFW)
body:
Yoongi begins to stir.  He wakes up and looks around; disoriented at first but then realizes he is in his room.  He looks over and notices that you are still sleeping.  He looks down your body and notices you are still wearing the filthy tattered clothes you were wearing when he saved you.  He gets off the bed and bends down to pick you up.  

He carries you to his bathroom.  Normally, he would have had the servants bathe and change you but he has decided to do himself.  He feels like he needs to keep you near.  He sits you in an armchair in the corner and turns towards the bath tub.  He turns on the water; making sure it isn’t to hot.  Once the bath had been filled, he turns to you and picks you up in one arm.  With his other arm, he begins removing your old clothes.  As he begins to lower you into the tub, you wake up and caress his cheek.  He looks into your eyes and smiles.

“Thank you for saving me.  I am sorry for all of the trouble I have caused you.  I have something I need to confess to you.  I feel something strange when I am around you.  It makes my insides feel warm and I feel like I am glowing.  What does it mean, Yoongi?”  You ask innocently as he removes his clothes to climb into the tub to help you bathe.  

“I don’t know what the feeling is but it is effecting me also.  I am going to help you wash.  Would you like me to wash your hair for you?” he says as he gets in the tub across from you.

You nod and smile at him.  You begin to wash your arms, legs, and torso.  He playfully grabs your foot and washes it.  You giggle as he tickles your feet with the wash cloth.  He smiles at you and says, “If you turn around, I will wash your back and your hair.”

You smile at him and turn around.  He slowly moves your hair to one shoulder.  He fights against his own instinct to kiss your bare shoulder and neck.  You close your eyes at the sensation of his touch.  He begins to wash your back.  You shiver at the soft caresses up and down your back.  You become disappointed then the sensation stopped.  He takes a pitcher from a near by table and begins to wet your hair.  As the warm water rains down your face, you let out a small moan.  The warmth of the water combined with the soft touches of Yoongi’s hands has your stomach all a flutter.  He shampoos your hair and massages your scalp.  You moan softly.  You have never felt such a feeling as you do now.  He rinses your hair and begins to condition it.  He works the conditioner through your hair; giving a slight tug as he runs his hands through it.  With each pull, you let out an almost silent moan.  He rinses your hair and then puts it over your shoulder.  You lean back against him.  He exhales sharply.  

“What are you doing?  You have no idea who I really am.  I am not a very nice guy.” Yoongi responds as you turn and smile at him.

“I am following my instincts.  And Min Yoongi, I am the only one in this world who knows the real you.  And although you may not be good all of the time, you are not bad all the time either.”  You smirk as you move up onto your knees facing him.  You take his face into your hands and gently place your lips upon his.  You continue to kiss until Yoongi broke away for a breath.  He looks into your shimmering pale blue eyes and returns his lips to yours.  Yoongi pulls away and stands up.  He climbs out of the tub and gently puts his arms around your waist.  You put your arms around his neck and allow him to lift you from the tub.  He picks you up; one arm behind your back and one behind your knees.  He begins to kiss you again while he is carrying you from the bathroom towards the bed.

He gently places you on the bed before returning to kissing your lips.  He moves his lips to your jawline, to behind your ear, to the nape of your neck and to your collarbone before returning to your jawline.  As he continues to blanket you in kisses and bruises, you moan and lace your fingers through his hair; playfully pulling occasionally.  He begins to kiss your collarbone again before redirecting his focus to your breasts.  He moves his mouth to your right nipple; licking and sucking gently.  You moan as this action sends warmth straight to your core.  He shifts his attention to your left breast while groping your right.  He takes your nipple between his thumb and index finger and applies gentle pressure; you moan and arch your back towards him.  While still stimulating your nipples, he kisses down your stomach passed your navel to the top of your mound.  

He spreads your legs farther apart and you open up to him. He stares in awe at your beauty.  He finds your clit and circles his tongue around it before he licks it like a cat drinking milk.  He licks harder eliciting howling moans from you.  As you reach your climax, your wings suddenly extend and you send a small shockwave from your body.  Unlike before Yoongi is immune to your shockwave.  He looks up at you and thinks, “She is an angel.  My Angel.  And absolutely no one is taking her from me.”  When you come down from your orgasm, your wings disappear and your breathing begins to return to normal.

He is now face to face with you.  He stares lovingly into your eyes and asks, “Are you sure you want to do this?  If you don’t, we can wait.  I will wait for you forever.”  He kisses you on your forehead and caresses your cheek.

“I am sure.  But I have never done this before.  I trust you.  I love you.  I think you were the reason I teleported to Seoul after Jeju was attacked.”  You tell him as you smile at him peacefully.

Yoongi brings his lips to yours and kisses you with the most heart felt passion.  While kissing you, he places his dick at your entrance and pushes in.  You through your head back and moan.  He waits for your signal to start.  He takes you digging your nails into his back as such a sign and quickens his pace.  Moving in and out, with every plunge you moan louder than before.  Your moans are met with his grunts and growls as you both are nearing your climax.  You both cum at the same time and this time the room is filled with a warm glow.  He continues to thrust in and out until you have milked him dry with your tight walls.  He pulls out kisses your forehead and says, “I love you, Kitten.”  After both of your breathing has steadied and you are no longer in the haze of your orgasm; you both feel a shockwave from elsewhere in the house.

He looks at you and says, “What was that?  Was that you?” He can’t resist touching you as he says this and before you can reply he is already hard again.

“It wasn’t me.  It was TaeTae.  I guess being around another sage witch has awakened his powers.” You tell him while staring into his eyes and brushing the hair from forehead.

“Should we go check on him?”  He questions worriedly.

“No, him and Kookie are fine.  More than fine in fact.”  You say to him with a raised eyebrow and a smirk.

“Oh.  Ok.  Are you tired?  Would you like to continue?”  He lovingly whispers as his lips brush the lobe of your ear.  

You shutter and reply, “No.  And if daddy want to continue, then we can.”

He looks at you shocked while you are saying this to him.  “Why did you call me, Daddy?”

“Because that is what you wish for me to call you.  Is it not?”  You coyly reply.

“Yes but how did you know?” He says as he climbs on top of you again.

“We are linked.  We have been ever since I hit you with that shockwave in the alley.  And perhaps even before that.”  You state as you lick your lips and look into his eyes.

“Kitten, you are going to enjoy this.” He says before he rolls you onto your side and gets behind you.  He kisses your neck and nips at your shoulder.  He raises you leg and puts it back on his hip.  He enters you.  You moan instantly.  He plunges deeper than before.  He increases speed and plunges balls deep into you; hitting your sweet spot.  You howl and he does the same as you walls constrict on him every time he hits it.  In this position, it doesn’t take long before you are both nearing climax.  All of the furniture on the second floor of the east wing begins to levitate.  A few more thrust and both climax together.  

He cam and said, “Oh god.  That was intense.  I have never experienced anything like what I just felt with you.  I love you from now until forever.  This lifetime and all lifetimes hence forth.”  

You turn towards him and kiss him with passion and love.  “I love you.  I always will and I think I always have.”  You tell him assuringly.  You both lay there for a while before he gets up and heads toward the bathroom.  You watch him walk naked across the room and think to yourself, “I Love you.  And no one is taking you from me; come hell or high water.  I will protect you, Min Yoongi.  The father of my child and the love of my life.”  You are looking at your stomach when you hear the bathroom door open.

You stand up and meet him halfway.  He asks, “Do you want to shower?”  You smile at him as you run your hands through his hair.  You look into his eyes, kiss the tip of his nose and nod.  Without hesitation, he picks you up and carries you to the bathroom.  He puts you down and turns on the water in the shower,  

“We need to hurry.  Namjoon is here and he wants to speak with you.”  you tell him as you both run your hands over each other’s bodies.  When you have finished, Yoongi walks to his closet and retrieves a change of clothes for himself.  

“Stay here and I will go get you something to wear.”  He says after he is done getting ready.  He kisses you on the lips and forehead before he leaves the room.  After ten minutes, he returns with a pinstriped pencil skirt, a black fluffy sweater, stockings, and a pair of wedge heeled boots.  “This is all I can find right now.  It is some of the things that my sister left behind before she went to Daegu.  I am sorry if you don’t like it.  After everything calms down, I will take you shopping.”  he says as he lays it out onto the bed.  

You look at the clothes and smile at him.  Before he can leave the room, you ran to him and hug and kiss.  “Thank you, Daddy.”  you say with a wink and a grin.

“Watch it, Kitten.  You don’t want to get me to excited.” Yoongi replies with smirk.  He leaves the room to go find Namjoon.  You get dressed the best you can and go to look for Yoongi.

question: "Dont look away from me" + Jin bts
answer:
lafdjoids hi sorry it’s been a little hectic but i am here n o w :)

“Don’t look away from me.”

 “One last chance, sweetheart. What do you know about Kim Seokjin? You know something, don’t think I don’t know about your little late night meet ups.” The man cackled from the shadows he was lurking in, making her skin crawl in disgust. She attempted to pull away from the men holding her against the wall again, but they only tightened their grip on her arms that bruises would definitely pop up within the next day. “I know all about how he touches you in those hotel rooms he pays for, how he makes you sing praises and-”

 A lump formed in her throat when the man suddenly stopped moving in front of her, his mouth opening only to spray blood from his mouth. The men holding her groaned in disgust, their words suddenly disappearing as they were choked from leaving their mouths. Y/N was still frozen against the wall, a new figure emerging from the shadows that only made her chest fill with relief. 

 “Jin-”

 “Y/N, I’m so sorry for this.” Jin mumbled, his hand coming up to her cheek to wipe at a splotch of blood that had landed there. Y/N gulped, only nodding at Jin before her eyes flickered behind him for the briefest second. Most likely Yoongi, brought his arm back to deliver a rather sickening punch that resulted in a resounding crack. Y/N couldn’t hold back the flinch from the sound and it was then that Jin carefully cupped each of her cheeks and forced her eyes back onto him. “Love, please. Focus on me.”

 “Jin-”

 “I’m serious, Y/N. Don’t look away from me, no matter what.” Jin was pleading with her, his eyes filling with some kind of fear that Y/N had never seen. It set her on edge but she agreed with a whispered okay and Jin was wrapping his arms around her, pulling her head against his chest in an effort to drown out the pain filled screams the men behind him were releasing as Jin’s own men delivered the punishment for even touching his girl.

no more requests, please! thank you!
